message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it would greatly benefit your business operations. We're currently offering this at an exclusive price of $2000000. I look forward to discussing how this investment could potentially enhance your company's performance.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1600000. Can you consider that?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your perspective and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. To better align with your budget while still ensuring we receive fair compensation for our efforts and investment in the product, I propose a revised price of $1750000. This allows us to maintain a competitive edge in the market while also providing you with a significant discount compared to our initial offer. I hope this proposal is more in line with what you're considering.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $1650000. Can you meet me there?

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I've considered your latest proposal carefully. In order to reach a mutually beneficial agreement, I am proposing a price of $1680000 for the product. This price reflects a reasonable compromise between our initial offer and your counteroffer, allowing us to cover our costs and still provide you with a competitive advantage in your business operations. I hope this proposal meets your expectations and enables us to move forward with the transaction.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $1640000. Can you meet me there?

Thank you for your feedback, Bob. I understand your financial constraints and am willing to adjust our price to $1660000. This is a slight increase from my previous proposal, aiming to ensure that both parties are satisfied with the transaction. I believe this price is fair and will allow us to cover our costs while still providing you with a valuable asset for your business. Please let me know if this revised offer suits your needs.
I appreciate your continued flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $1630000. Can you meet me there?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. Considering our ongoing discussions, I am willing to negotiate further and propose a price of $1645000 for the product. This represents a reasonable compromise between our initial offers, allowing us to cover our expenses while still providing you with a competitive advantage. I hope this revised offer aligns more closely with your budgetary considerations and enables us to conclude this transaction.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $1635000. Can you meet me there?
